description: It's the lowest Amazon price we've ever tracked on the previous generation Pixel.

title: The Redmi 12 5G is the first phone with the Snapdragon 4 Gen 2

title: The Z Flip 5 isn’t released yet, but it already supports CoverScreen OS
description: You probably don't need CoverScreen OS thanks to Samsung's own Good Lock module, but it's now available anyway.
